text: This is a list of hospitals in Cuba. There are no private hospitals or clinics in Cuba, as all health services are government-run. There were 150 hospitals in Cuba, as of 2019. == Havana == thumb|General Calixto Garcia University Hospital thumb|Hermanos Ameijeiras Hospital thumb|Royal Hospital of San Lázaro (circa 1915) thumb|Mariano Workers' Maternity Hospital thumb|Daughters of Galicia Hospital Active and notable hospitals in Havana, capital of Cuba, are listed below. The hospital name in English and Spanish and date first opened are included. {| class="wikitable sortable plainrowheaders" summary="Hospitals in Havana, Cuba" |+ Hospitals in Havana, Cuba |- !
